search.query:
| inputlookup foundational_systems_use_case_metadata.csv
| fields ssphp.use_case.id, ssphp.use_case.title, ssphp.cis_benchmark.controls.ig1, ssphp.cis_benchmark.controls.ig2, ssphp.cis_benchmark.controls.ig3, ssphp.cis_benchmark.control.level, ssphp.score.ciso_priority, ssphp.cis_benchmark.control.title
| join type=outer ssphp.use_case.id [| search index="ssphp_metrics_summary" [| search index="ssphp_metrics_summary" ssphp.use_case.id!="*_000" | stats max(SSPHP_RUN) as SSPHP_RUN by ssphp.use_case.id | eval search_text="(\"ssphp.use_case.id\"=\"".'ssphp.use_case.id'."\" AND SSPHP_RUN=\"".SSPHP_RUN."\")" | stats values(search_text) as search_text | eval search_text="(".mvjoin(search_text," OR ").")" | return $$search_text] | eval last_run=strftime(SSPHP_RUN,"%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S") | table ssphp.use_case.id, ssphp.score.score, ssphp.score.color, last_run]
| fillnull value="-" ssphp.score.score, ssphp.score.color
| join type=outer ssphp.use_case.id [| rest /servicesNS/-/-/saved/searches splunk_server=local | eval ssphp.use_case.id=replace(title,"ssphp_use_case_",""), exists="TRUE" | table ssphp.use_case.id, exists] | fillnull value="FALSE" exists
| search ssphp.use_case.id="m365*" AND $tkn_ig$ AND $tkn_l$
``` sort the lines properly ``` | rex field=ssphp.use_case.id "^m365_00[0-9]{1}_cis_(?<n1>[^-]*)-(?<n2>[^-]*)" | rex field=ssphp.use_case.id "^m365_00[0-9]{1}_cis_[^-]*-[^-]*-(?<n3>.*)$$" | fillnull value=0 n3 | eval n2="00".n2, n2=substr(n2,len(n2)-1,2), n3="00".n3, n3=substr(n3,len(n3)-1,2), sort_field='n1'.'n2'.'n3' | sort 0 sort_field | fields - sort_field, n1, n2, n3
| rename ssphp.use_case.id as "Use Case ID", ssphp.use_case.title as "Title", ssphp.cis_benchmark.control.title as "Control Title", ssphp.score.score as "Score", ssphp.score.color as "Color", last_run as "Last Run Time", ssphp.cis_benchmark.controls.ig1 as "IG1", ssphp.cis_benchmark.controls.ig2 as "IG2", ssphp.cis_benchmark.controls.ig3 as "IG3", ssphp.cis_benchmark.control.level as "Level", ssphp.score.ciso_priority as "CISO Priority", exists as "Development Completed"
| table "Use Case ID", "Title", "Control Title", "Score", "Color", "Last Run Time", "IG1", "IG2", "IG3", "Level", "CISO Priority", "Development Completed"
| eventstats count as tkn_controls, sum(eval(if('Development Completed'="TRUE",1,0))) as tkn_done

table.fields: "Use Case ID", "Title", "Control Title", "Score", "Color", "Last Run Time", "IG1", "IG2", "IG3", "Level", "CISO Priority", "Development Completed"
